# Getting started

### [Github repository](https://github.com/cookbook-ms/Chung_Lu_Chain-synthesizer)

## Installation

If you are using ``pip``, run the following command to install ``powergridsynth``:
```bash
pip install powergridsynth
```

## Compliling documentation
```bash
make html
```
To view the compiled documentation open the file ``_build/html/index.html``.


## User guide
